title: Matt Hancock – 2023 Statement on Allegations He Sought to Block a Disability Centre to Punish an MP
author: admin
summary: The statement made by Matt Hancock, the former Secretary of State for Health and Social Care, on 7 March 2023.
content:
What’s being accused here never happened, demonstrating the story is wrong, and showing why such a biased, partial approach to the evidence is a bad mistake, driven by those with a vested interest and an axe to grind.
